channel.title: Comments on: Croissants – Daring Bakers Challenge September 2011

item.title: By: Food is our religion
item.dc:creator: Food is our religion
item.description: Wow, this is the first time I've read someone try to make a croissants! With disregards to the number of steps, it seems easier than I thought. They look so cute!!
item.content:encoded: Wow, this is the first time I’ve read someone try to make a croissants! With disregards to the number of steps, it seems easier than I thought. They look so cute!!

item.title: By: betty
item.dc:creator: betty
item.description: your crossiants are so cute! i bet they are soooo tasty too
item.content:encoded: your crossiants are so cute! i bet they are soooo tasty too

item.title: By: Barbara
item.dc:creator: Barbara
item.description: Those are wonderful!! I would eat them every day too...probably with every meal :)
item.content:encoded: Those are wonderful!! I would eat them every day too…probably with every meal ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Cassandra @aperfectpantry
item.dc:creator: Cassandra @aperfectpantry
item.description: I have been meaning to make crossiants for ages. I read an article recently in gourmet traveller on making them but their steps weren't very well explained! I shall have a go with your recipe. I just want to slop jam over these and eat them all up!
item.content:encoded: I have been meaning to make crossiants for ages. I read an article recently in gourmet traveller on making them but their steps weren’t very well explained! I shall have a go with your recipe. I just want to slop jam over these and eat them all up!

item.title: By: Jenni
item.dc:creator: Jenni
item.description: Your croissants look utterly amazing! Great job! I would love to have them for breakfast almost every morning, too. But seeing as how the 12 I made barely lasted a day, I would be spending all day every day baking them! :) And congrats on getting a new (to you) granite countertop!
item.content:encoded: Your croissants look utterly amazing! Great job! I would love to have them for breakfast almost every morning, too. But seeing as how the 12 I made barely lasted a day, I would be spending all day every day baking them! ðŸ™‚ And congrats on getting a new (to you) granite countertop!

item.title: By: Suz
item.dc:creator: Suz
item.description:
Me too. I could eat croissants every day. Maybe it's just as well I don't live near a good bakery!
Congratulations on your beautiful croissants! I can almost smell them from here.
item.content:encoded:
Me too. I could eat croissants every day. Maybe it’s just as well I don’t live near a good bakery!

Congratulations on your beautiful croissants! I can almost smell them from here.

item.title: By: Kim
item.dc:creator: Kim
item.description: Your triangles actually look like triangles! And I love the yellow of the butter contrasted against the dough. Nice job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: Your triangles actually look like triangles! And I love the yellow of the butter contrasted against the dough. Nice job on the challenge!

item.title: By: Jo
item.dc:creator: Jo
item.description: I agree, I could eat croissants for breakfast everyday if I had the chance. Fabulous job on the challenge!
item.content:encoded: I agree, I could eat croissants for breakfast everyday if I had the chance. Fabulous job on the challenge!

item.title: By: marcellina
item.dc:creator: marcellina
item.description: Your croissants look amazing! I think I could eat croissants every morning for breakfast too but then I wouldn't get out the door!
item.content:encoded: Your croissants look amazing! I think I could eat croissants every morning for breakfast too but then I wouldn’t get out the door!

item.title: By: Audax Artifex
item.dc:creator: Audax Artifex
item.description: WOW those photos are exquisite the colour of the crust is stunning bravo to you well done. Great step by step photos. Cheers from Audax in Sydney Australia.
item.content:encoded: WOW those photos are exquisite the colour of the crust is stunning bravo to you well done. Great step by step photos. Cheers from Audax in Sydney Australia.
